## Discussion

This version of `setActionName(_:)` takes a [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/LocalizedStringResource]. When using this version, [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/UndoManager/undoActionName], [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/UndoManager/redoActionName], [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/UndoManager/undoMenuItemTitle], and [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/UndoManager/redoMenuItemTitle] interpret the provided resource using the current locale.

The undo manager parses the parameter as Markdown using [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/AttributedString/init(localized:)] in order to support inflection.

If `actionNameResource` is `nil`, the undo manager removes the action name currently associated with the menu command.

# setActionName(_:)

**Instance Method**

Sets the name of the action associated with the Undo or Redo command using a localized string resource.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency final func setActionName(_ actionNameResource: LocalizedStringResource?)
```

## Parameters

- **actionNameResource**: The name of the action, as a [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/LocalizedStringResource]. Pass in `nil` to reset the action name currently associated with the menu command.

## Discussion

This version of `setActionName(_:)` takes a [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/LocalizedStringResource]. When using this version, [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/UndoManager/undoActionName], [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/UndoManager/redoActionName], [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/UndoManager/undoMenuItemTitle], and [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/UndoManager/redoMenuItemTitle] interpret the provided resource using the current locale.

The undo manager parses the parameter as Markdown using [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/AttributedString/init(localized:)] in order to support inflection.

If `actionNameResource` is `nil`, the undo manager removes the action name currently associated with the menu command.

## Managing the action name

- **undoActionName**: The name identifying the undo action.
- **redoActionName**: The name identifying the redo action.
- **setActionName(_:)**: Sets the name of the action associated with the Undo or Redo command.

items.description: The name identifying the undo action.
items.name: undoActionName

items.description: The name identifying the redo action.
items.name: redoActionName

items.description: Sets the name of the action associated with the Undo or Redo command.
